name: JEWELiNX
description:
Game Overview

Break down gems by sorting them pair by pair, or set up non matching gems to try and maximizes how many you can break at once!This game encourages high scoring combos over simple brick matching, so creativity and combos are king!

A part of the Game Buddy series that faithfully recreates the look, sounds, and feel of classic late 80's handheld games in a way that's like experiencing an alternate timeline of gaming history.

Gameplay

Drop like blocks on one another to make them disappear...But! Don't do it too simply, or you'll incur a block penalty! Avoid the penalty and get the most points by dropping gems in a way they'll chain off each into an avalanche of gems and points!

Two becomes four, four becomes eight...
how high of a combo can you make?

GAME-A
Use endurance and imagination in this mode to seeing how long you can keep stacking and how big of a combo chain you can make! All scores are accumulated and can be used to unlock a wide variety of new types of blocks.

GAME-B
Start with a set number of blocks, and try to destroy them all before your screen becomes overrun! Adjust the stage and/or difficulty of either mode for added challenge!

Features

  • puzzle game-play that encourages quick foresightful thinking.
  • 8-bit sights and sounds that faithfully emulates the early era of handheld gaming.
  • Six different types of block skins to unlock.
  • two game modes, four difficulty levels, and five stages to choose from.
  • Catchy and nostalgic chiptune music.

How to access the menu

To access the game menu and manual, press select button on gamepad or shift key on keyboard.
